comments.author: Doron Cohen
comments.body: Does anyone see why this should remain? (I will wait ~2 days before actually removing it)

comments.author: Doron Cohen
comments.body: Just to make sure this is clear, the package in question is: o.a.l.benchmark.stats

description: This seems like a leftover from the original benchmark implementation and can thus be removed.
summary: benchmark/stats package is obsolete and unused - remove it
